channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Lucy Dacus Seeks To Officiate Fans’ Weddings On Upcoming Tour
item.description: 💍🎶 Lovebirds, @lucydacus wants to make your day extra special on tour! Who's saying 'I do'? #WeddingBells #LucyDacusMatrimony

item.title: Pynch Announce New Album Beautiful Noise: Hear “Post-Punk/New-Wave”
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to dance! 🕺💃 Dive into the "Post-Punk/New-Wave" vibes of Pynch's new album, Beautiful Noise! 🌟 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Tame Impala Tease New Single “End of Summer”
item.description: 🌟 Feeling those Tame Impala vibes with "End of Summer" on repeat! Who else is loving this sneak peek? 🎶☀️ #NewMusicAlert #TameImpala

item.title: Tyler the Creator announces surprise NYC show TONIGHT at Under the K Bridge
item.description: 🌟 Last-minute plans? Tyler the Creator is taking over NYC TONIGHT at Under the K Bridge! Who's in? 🎶 #TylerNYC #LiveMusicVibes

item.title: Flock of Dimes Announces Tour and New Album, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
item.description: 🎉🎶 Exciting news! @flockofdimes is hitting the road and dropping a new album! 🚐✨ Check out their fresh music video now! 📺🔥 #FlockofDimesTour
